repairedDockerfile:
FROM openjdk:8u181-jdk

RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y gcc g++ && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ENV SCALA_VERSION 2.12.4
ENV SBT_VERSION 1.0.4

# Install sbt
RUN \
  curl -f -L -o sbt-$SBT_VERSION.deb https://dl.bintray.com/sbt/debian/sbt-$SBT_VERSION.deb && \
  dpkg -i sbt-$SBT_VERSION.deb && \
  rm sbt-$SBT_VERSION.deb && \
  apt-get update && \
  apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends sbt && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

VOLUME /threading

WORKDIR /threading
